hours_text:
## Longue Vue

Preserving and sharing a legacy of design, community, and lifelong learning

_Masterpiece of trailblazing female designer Ellen Biddle Shipman, Longue Vue was established as a family home in 1921 and donated as a community resource in 1980. The family who lived here – Edith and Edgar Stern and their children – collaborated with Shipman to design a space of belonging and wellness for all. In 1980 they donated the eight-acre estate to serve community full-time.  
  
In honor of the legacy, Longue Vue today is a space for personal growth, social progress, and community connections in the beauty of nature. Our mission is **to preserve and share a legacy of design, community, and lifelong learning.**_

[About Longue Vue](/our-story)

[About Ellen Shipman](https://longuevue.com/shipman-legacy/)

## Membership  
Matters

## Become a Member

Join Longue Vue today and experience the beauty of this New Orleans landmark estate. As a member, you can enjoy inspiring art and garden exhibits, music events, workshops, festivals, and special programs throughout the year.

admission_text:
## Plan Your Visit

## __Location

7 Bamboo Rd.,  
New Orleans, LA 70124

## __Parking

On-site parking is included with admission

## __Hours

Mon – Sun:

9:30 AM – 5:00 PM

## Gardens Admission

Self-guided access to our eight acres of historic gardens.   
Available 9:00AM – 5:00PM daily.

Adults: $15 in advance or $17 upon arrival

Children: Free for ages 3 and under

Members: Free

[Purchase Tickets](http://13403a.blackbaudhosting.com/13403a/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=599a8e98-0cce-4e7a-96d0-0353aad7baa3)

## House Tour

45-minute guided house tour and self-guided gardens access.   
Tours begin at 10:00AM, 11:30AM, 1:00PM, 2:30PM, and 4:00PM daily.

Adults: $27 in advance or $29 upon arrival

Children: Free for ages 3 and under

Members (Ellen and Higher): Free

Includes Garden Admission

[Purchase Tickets](http://13403a.blackbaudhosting.com/13403a/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=02a6ed8e-252e-4af8-9f50-9f4677de2956%20)

## House & Gardens Tour

75-minute guided tour of the house and the surrounding gardens.   
Tours begin at 10:00AM, 11:30AM, 1:00PM, and 2:30PM daily.

Adults: $35 in advance or $37 upon arrival

Children: Free for ages 3 and under

Members (Edith and Higher): Free

Includes Garden Admission 

[Purchase Tickets](http://13403a.blackbaudhosting.com/13403a/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=bbf058f4-d608-4cc4-8f86-26aa6fae17ec)

Longue Vue is committed to ensuring access for all. If ticket prices create an obstacle to visiting, please email Connor at [ckilian@longuevue.com](mailto:ckil...
